text:
Hello Louis, is it possible that you need "custom behavioral events"? Just throwing this here as I didn't fully understand your case and I'm not familiar with mobile development, but seems to me you may need something like this.

<https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/analytics-tools/create-custom-behavioral-events>

I can get all engagements in my account with the following request: `<https://api.hubapi.com/engagements/v1/engagements/paged?hapikey=${API_KEY}&limit=1>`, however, the engagements associations ContactIds field is empty, so I can't directly tie the engagement to a contact: `"associations": { "contactIds": [], ... }` is there a way to get the contactID for each engagement?
